name: TradeGecko Pte Ltd
description: Provider of a cloud-based inventory management software-as-a-service (SaaS) platform intended to automate and reduce workflow inefficiencies. The company's platform integrates front-end e-commerce and POS software with back-end accounting and shipping software, enabling SMBs to manage their inventory efficiently, process orders quickly and change the pricing of their products dynamically.
one_liner: Provider of a cloud-based inventory management software-as-a-service (SaaS) platform intended to automate and reduce workflow inefficiencies. The company's platform integrates front-end e-commerce and POS software with back-end accounting and shipping software, enabling SMBs to manage their inventory efficiently, process orders quickly and change the pricing of their products dynamically.
